title: How to skip end game lobby?
body:
Hi, friends!
I wanted to know how to skip the end game lobby/score screen so i can avoid looking at the chat.
Sometimes people camp me so hard and proceed on typing things like "sorry for that camp" or something that tilts me.
And sometimes i just want to get straight to the next game without listening what other people have to say.
The thing is, the system tells people whether i am in the lobby or not and I really dislike that cause they end up knowing that I've seen their insults or BM.

Someone please help!

replies.body: Don't believe there's a way to turn on skipping post-game lobby, but if you hit the skip waiting for stats button it'll put you straight back to the client homepage.
its two separate clients so if you exit the game or alt+F4 it should avoid it
